title: Quick on the Trigger Bot Commands
description: If you're having any trouble with the bot, feel free to contact any of the staff through a DM or @ us on the server!

fields.name: Answer Command
fields.value: If you think you've got the answer to the question use this command! To answer, type `!answer ` followed by your answer. Don't worry about spaces, symbols, or uppercase letters in your answer!```!answer your answer goes here```

fields.name: Score Command
fields.value: Use this command to check your current score!```!score```

fields.name: Attempts Left Command
fields.value: Use this command to check how many tries you have left for the current question. Remember, you only get 3 tries per question so make it count!```!attempts```

fields.name: Help Command
fields.value: Use this command to display the rules, details, and commands for the event!```!help```

fields.name: Leave Command
fields.value: Use this command if don't want to receive pings from the bot anymore. **If you want to re-join and answer questions, use the `!join` command!**```!leave```
